description.black-white:
The user breaks its shell, lowering its
Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply
raising Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

effect.full: Raises the user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages each.  Lowers the user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage each.
effect.shortEffect: Raises user's Attack, Special Attack, and Speed by two stages.  Lower user's Defense and Special Defense by one stage.
